content:
本件保存七年 02-62- 1592
May 21, 2
To : Mr. B. T. Potter, supply Advisor, US AID/C From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang Subject : Excess Equipment
Original signed by
Reference is made to your Letter MC-3791 dated May 17, 1962.
We concur in the recommendation of your Industry Division that the following equipment referred to in our letter 02-62-1431 dated May 8, 1962 and now located at the Tainan Air Base be allocated to SEC.
(1) One trailer, fuel unit) 2000 gal (43 L. 1695) (2) Four truck tractors, 5 ton (53 K 27733, 53 K 16048, 52 × 21946, 52 K 21994)
(3) One engine assembly (2605-695-7194) Copy of KsHB letter dated May 3, 1968 is returned herewith.
Enel. JCWhite, SEG P.B, THB, K286, KellB 22, 30, 40
CAK/sml
E-16.13.2
51. 3. 100×200
國史馆 Academia Historica
390
